item.title: 美国食品及药物管理局（FDA）推动减少动物试验，人工智能驱动的药物发现加速发展
item.description: 药物开发商正越来越多地采用人工智能技术进行发现和安全性测试，以获得更快、更便宜的结果，这与美国食品及药物管理局推动在不久的将来减少动物试验是一致的。【原文：Drug developers are increasing adoption of AI technologies for discovery and safety testing to get faster and cheaper results, in line with an FDA push to reduce animal testing in the near future.】

item.title: 挪威财富基金购买纽约办公楼 95% 的股份
item.description: 挪威主权财富基金周二表示，它已购买了纽约市美洲大道沿线一处办公楼物业95%的股份。【原文：Norway's sovereign wealth fund said on Tuesday it has bought a 95% stake in an office property located along New York City's Avenue of the Americas.】

item.title: 巴西第二季度经济大幅放缓但仍超预期
item.description: 周二的官方数据显示，巴西经济在第二季度失去了增长势头，但在服务业活动复苏和采掘业增长的推动下，其表现仍优于市场预期。【原文：Brazil's economy lost momentum in the second quarter but still outperformed market expectations, driven by resilient services activity and gains in the extractive industry, official data showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 世贸组织负责人：关税对全球贸易规则造成 "前所未有 "的破坏
item.description: 世界贸易组织总干事周二告诉路透社记者，在国际贸易体系遭遇过去80年来最严重破坏的情况下，按世贸组织条件完成的全球贸易份额已降至72%，而且还可能进一步下降。【原文：The share of global trade done on WTO terms has fallen to 72% and could fall further, amid the biggest disruption to the international trading system in the past 80 years, the Director-General of the World Trade Organization told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 雀巢新任首席执行官面临诸多问题
item.description: Laurent Freixe 的突然解职让 Philipp Navratil 一夜之间成为了最高职位。【原文：The abrupt dismissal of Laurent Freixe has catapulted Philipp Navratil into the top job overnight.】

item.title: 印度市场监管部门批准美容和家庭护理应用 Urban Company 首次公开募股
item.description: 周二的一份监管公告显示，印度市场监管部门已批准 Urban Company 首次公开发行股票。【原文：India's markets regulator has approved an initial public offering by Urban Company, a regulatory notice showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 零售商和农民团体要求印度避开亚马逊放宽投资规则的请求
item.description: 一封信显示，支持数百万印度小型零售商的团体敦促政府回避亚马逊提出的放宽严格的出口外商投资规定的要求，因为反对这一有争议的政策变化的呼声日益高涨。【原文：Groups backing millions of small Indian retailers have urged the government to shun Amazon's request to ease strict foreign investment rules for exports, a letter shows, as opposition to a contentious policy change grows.】

item.title: 我们对卡夫亨氏分拆后业务的了解
item.description: 卡夫亨氏（Kraft Heinz）周二表示，将把旗下的食品杂货和调味酱业务分拆成两家上市公司，以应对消费者消费疲软。【原文：Kraft Heinz said on Tuesday it will split its grocery and sauces businesses into two publicly traded companies, responding to sluggish consumer spending.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，埃利奥特以 40 亿美元入股百事公司
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，埃利奥特管理公司（Elliott Management）已持有百事公司 40 亿美元的股份，并正计划发起一场激进运动，以提振该公司的股价。【原文：Elliott Management has taken a $4 billion stake in PepsiCo and is planning an activist campaign to boost the company's share price, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 连锁咖啡馆黑岩咖啡吧在美国首次公开募股中的目标估值为 8.61 亿美元
item.description: 黑石咖啡吧连锁店周二表示，其纽约首次公开募股的目标估值高达 8.607 亿美元。【原文：Black Rock Coffee Bar is targeting a valuation of up to $860.7 million in its New York initial public offering, the cafe chain said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 英国 JLR 公司的生产和销售在网络事件后中断
item.description: 英国豪华汽车制造商捷豹-路虎（Jaguar Land Rover）周二表示，由于发生网络事件，其零售和生产活动受到严重干扰。【原文：British luxury carmaker Jaguar Land Rover on Tuesday said that its retail and production activities have been severely disrupted following a cyber incident.】

item.title: 备忘录称，大众劳资老板敦促布卢姆放弃双重首席执行官职位
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份内部备忘录，大众汽车公司的劳工老板周二向首席执行官奥利弗-布卢姆施加了更大的压力，要求他放弃作为这家总部位于沃尔夫斯堡的汽车制造商及其保时捷公司领导人的双重身份。【原文：Volkswagen's labour boss on Tuesday increased pressure on CEO Oliver Blume to give up his dual role as the leader of both the Wolfsburg-based carmaker and its Porsche AG unit, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 陶氏以 5.4 亿美元出售基础设施合资企业的额外股份
item.description: 陶氏化学公司周二表示，该公司已向合作伙伴麦格理资产管理公司（Macquarie Asset Management）以 5.4 亿美元的价格出售了其基础设施合资企业的额外股份，因为这家化学品制造商希望更加专注于其核心业务。【原文：Dow said on Tuesday it has sold an additional stake in its infrastructure venture to its partner Macquarie Asset Management for $540 million as the chemical maker looks to focus more on its core business.】

item.title: Blackstone 支持的 Legence 在美国 IPO 的目标估值近 30 亿美元
item.description: 工程与维护服务供应商 Legence 周二表示，其美国首次公开募股的目标估值最高可达 29.5 亿美元，因为新股上市市场在夏季季节性放缓之后重新开始运作。【原文：Engineering and maintenance services provider Legence is targeting a valuation of up to $2.95 billion in its U.S. initial public offering, it said on Tuesday, as the new listings market kicks back into action after the seasonal summer slowdown.】

item.title: 温克艾沃斯比特币双胞胎兄弟的 Gemini 在美国首次公开募股中寻求高达 3.17 亿美元的资金
item.description: 加密货币交易所 Gemini 周二表示，其美国首次公开募股的目标是筹集高达 3.167 亿美元的资金，这凸显了新股上市的强劲势头。【原文：Gemini is aiming to raise up to $316.7 million in its U.S. initial public offering, the cryptocurrency exchange said on Tuesday, underscoring a strong momentum for new listings.】

item.title: 瑞典金融科技公司 Klarna 计划在期待已久的首次公开募股中筹集高达 12.7 亿美元的资金
item.description: 周二的一份监管文件显示，瑞典金融科技公司 Klarna 希望在备受瞩目的美国首次公开募股中筹集多达 12.7 亿美元的资金。【原文：Swedish fintech Klarna is looking to raise as much as $1.27 billion in its much-anticipated U.S. initial public offering, a regulatory filing showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价：美元、黄金和多头收益率飙升
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 独家报道美国监管机构取消银行审查，特朗普倒台步伐加快
item.description: 超过半打的行业高管表示，美国监管机构正在减少对一些银行的检查和保密纪律通知的使用，这表明贷款机构已经从唐纳德-特朗普总统政府的温和政策中受益。【原文：U.S. regulators are pulling back on some bank exams and the use of confidential disciplinary notices, a sign lenders are already benefiting from a softer touch under President Donald Trump's administration, said more than half a dozen industry executives.】

item.title: 意大利法院削减对亚马逊11亿欧元的反垄断罚款
item.description: 周二的一项裁决显示，意大利一家行政法院减少了意大利竞争管理机构 2021 年以涉嫌滥用支配地位为由对亚马逊处以的 11.3 亿欧元（13.2 亿美元）的罚款。【原文：An Italian administrative court has reduced a 1.13-billion-euro ($1.32 billion) fine imposed on Amazon in 2021 by Italy's competition authority for alleged abuse of a dominant position, a ruling showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 本周重要数据公布前，美国股指期货因谨慎而下滑
item.description: 劳动节假期结束后，美国股指期货周二下跌，因为投资者在等待未来一周的重要经济数据，预计这些数据将影响美联储的宽松货币政策立场。【原文：U.S. stock index futures fell on Tuesday, after the Labor Day holiday, as investors awaited crucial economic data in the week ahead that is expected to shape the Federal Reserve's stance on monetary easing.】

item.title: 印度 TCS 获得斯堪的纳维亚保险公司 Tryg 6.44 亿美元交易
item.description: 印度最大的 IT 公司塔塔咨询服务公司（Tata Consultancy Services）周二表示，该公司获得了斯堪的纳维亚保险公司 Tryg 5.5 亿欧元（约合 6.4389 亿美元）的订单，这是该公司本财年的第一笔大型交易。【原文：India's largest IT firm Tata Consultancy Services has bagged a 550 million euro ($643.89 million) order from Scandinavian insurance firm Tryg , the company said on Tuesday, announcing its first mega deal this fiscal year.】

item.title: 在线分类信息企业 Swiss Marketplace Group 准备首次公开募股
item.description: 在线分类信息企业瑞士市场集团周二表示，该公司打算在未来几周内在苏黎世 SIX 股票交易所上市，这标志着欧洲首次公开发行股票的预期浪潮已经开始。【原文：Online classifieds business Swiss Marketplace Group intends to float in the coming weeks on the Zurich SIX stock exchange, it said on Tuesday, marking the start of an expected wave of European initial public offerings.】

item.title: 印度棉花购买量创纪录，进口和美国关税打压价格
item.description: 业内官员告诉路透社，由于国内棉花价格面临廉价进口棉花的压力，以及美国对纺织品出口征收高额关税后需求疲软，印度预计将在下一季从农民手中购买创纪录数量的棉花。【原文：India is expected to purchase a record volume of cotton from farmers in the upcoming season, as domestic prices face pressure from cheaper imports and weakening demand following hefty U.S. tariffs on textile exports, industry officials told Reuters.】

item.title: 卡夫亨氏将分拆为两家公司以促进增长
item.description: 卡夫亨氏（Kraft Heinz）周二表示，该公司将分拆为两家上市公司，一家专注于调味品业务，另一家专注于食品杂货业务。【原文：Kraft Heinz said on Tuesday it would split into two publicly-listed companies, one focusing on the sauces business and the other on groceries, as the U.S. packaged goods maker aims to revive growth after years of muted sales.】

item.title: 以太币机器私募以太币融资 6.54 亿美元，纳斯达克上市在即
item.description: 以太币机器公司周二表示，该公司已在私募融资中筹集到价值 6.54 亿美元的以太币，加密货币公司将在今年晚些时候在纳斯达克上市前扩大其资金战略。【原文：The Ether Machine has raised $654 million worth of ether in private financing, it said on Tuesday, as the cryptocurrency firm expands its treasury strategy ahead of its Nasdaq listing later this year.】

item.title: 独家报道数据显示：尽管促销范围扩大，亚马逊美国Prime注册人数增长缓慢
item.description: 亚马逊今年将 Prime Day 折扣销售翻了一番，增加到四天，并在活动结束后的几天内吹嘘了井喷式的销售数字。但从一个关键指标来看，亚马逊的表现并不尽如人意。【原文：Amazon doubled its Prime Day discount sales to four days this year and touted blowout numbers days after the event. But by one critical metric, it missed the mark.】

item.title: 美联储在就业问题上面临潜在支点，故事情节出现分化
item.description: 过去三个月的就业增长是美国经济从 2007 年至 2009 年金融危机和经济衰退中艰难复苏以来，除大流行病之外最疲软的时期之一。【原文：Job growth over the last three months has hit one of the weakest patches, outside the pandemic, since the U.S. economy was limping to recover from the 2007 to 2009 financial crisis and recession.】

item.title: 聚焦：美国减肥热潮退去，中国企业转向仿制药
item.description: 据三位消息人士透露，路透社对运输和公共记录的审查显示，一些正在竞相生产诺和诺德仿制药Wegovy的中国公司，在过去两年里还为美国网上销售的超过十亿剂量的临时减肥药提供原料。【原文：Some Chinese companies now racing to make generic versions of Novo Nordisk's Wegovy also supplied ingredients for more than a billion makeshift doses of weight-loss drugs sold online in the U.S. over the past two years, according to three sources and a Reuters review of shipping and public records.】

item.title: 报道称，马来西亚传唤 TikTok 管理层，原因是在处理假新闻方面存在延误
item.description: 据马来西亚国家通讯社周二援引马来西亚通讯部长的话报道，马来西亚当局已传唤 TikTok 高层管理人员，原因是该社交媒体公司涉嫌拖延处理其平台上的假新闻。【原文：Malaysian authorities have summoned TikTok's top management over the social media company's alleged delays in tackling fake news on its platform, state news agency Bernama reported on Tuesday, citing Malaysia's communications minister.】

item.title: 中国恒大清算人申请接管人确认创始人资产
item.description: 中国恒大曾是中国最大的房地产开发商，其清算人已要求香港法院指定接管人，以确认并保存创始人许家印的资产，而许家印并未披露其在全球的财产。【原文：Liquidators of China Evergrande, once the country's largest property developer, have asked a Hong Kong court to appoint receivers to identify and preserve the assets of founder Hui Ka Yan, who has not disclosed his worldwide properties.】
